Text: The installer is indeed rigged with a variation of the sasser virus. Going back with system restore will fix everything again if your to late to read this.
I followed the suggestion in the comment to extract with Universal Extractor. My malware scanner doesnt seem good enough to pick anything up so could someone say which files are infected?
Don't know what the commotion is about works fine on my system, it did throw up a malaware warning, I just moved it to the vault and the game is working brilliant.
